high_descs: Turn to your left to face the left bathroom sink.
Pick up the bar of soap that is on the back of the counter.
Turn left and walk over to the toilet area.
Place the bar of soap in the trash bin that is to the right of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move a bar of soap to the trash bin.

high_descs: Walk two steps ahead and turn left to face the sinks.
Pick up the soap on the counter in the middle of the sinks.
Turn left and walk to the front of the toilet.
Place the soap in the bin to the right of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Place a bar of soap in a garbage bin.

high_descs: Move straight then turn left facing the soap on the counter top between the two sinks
Pick up the bar of soap on the counter
Carry the bar of soap to the left where the trash can is to the right of the toilet
Place the soap in the trash can
anns.task_desc: Move a bar of soap to the trash
